price: Waɗanda suka kangara suka ce: "Lalle mũ duka munã a cikinta. Lalle ne, Allah Ya yi hukunci a tsakãnin bãyin Sa."
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā kullun fīhā inna al-laha qad ḥakama bayna al-ʿibādi
